Control Name: Uses Personal Information for Intended Purposes—Personal information is used only for the intended purposes for which it was collected and only when implicit or explicit consent has been obtained unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.

control_attributes.Control: Uses Personal Information for Intended Purposes—Personal information is used only for the intended purposes for which it was collected and only when implicit or explicit consent has been obtained unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.
control_attributes.SubCategory: P4.1 The entity limits the use of personal information to the purposes identified in the entity’s objectives related to privacy.
